description: This is a React-like component file using the LightningJS framework. It defines a 'Home' component that manages a notes application's UI, including a notes list, note viewer, and editor, along with methods for editing and managing notes.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: The main component class for the notes app interface, handling state management, UI rendering, and user interactions.

methods.name: formatDate
methods.description: Formats a timestamp into a locale-specific date string.

methods.name: handleSelectNote
methods.description: Handles the event of selecting a note from the list.

methods.name: handleDeleteNote
methods.description: Handles the event of deleting a specific note.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Saves the content from the note editor, either updating an existing note or adding a new one.

methods.name: handleCreateNew
methods.description: Resets the editor for creating a new note.

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Prepares the editor to edit the current note.
